Report.name: Simple List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple list report.

Report.name: Two Simple Lists
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create two simple list reports.

Report.name: Highlight Condition
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use highlight condition to create a report.

Report.name: Shapes
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with shapes.

Report.name: Watermark
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with watermark.

Report.name: BarCodes
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with Bar-Codes.

Report.name: HTML Tags
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with using HTML tags.

Report.name: Invoice
Report.desc: A simple invoice.

Report.name: Indicators
Report.desc: This sample shows how to use indicators in the report.

Report.name: Multi-Column List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns. To create a report with columns set the Columns property of a page to two or more.

Report.name: Multi-Column Bands, Across-Down
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - across then down.

Report.name: Multi-Column Bands, Down-Across
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - down then across.

Report.name: Labels
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with labels.

Report.name: Master-Detail
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report.

Report.name: Master-Detail with Columns
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report with columns.

Report.name: Two Masters on One Detail
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with two master-detail links. And detail for both links is the same.

Report.name: Master-Detail on DataBand
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report in which one of the bands is placed on another one.

Report.name: Simple Group
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple group report with one group.

Report.name: Multi-Column Group
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple group report with two columns on a page.

Report.name: Invoice with Groups
Report.desc: An invoice with categories.

Report.name: Tree
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create an hierarchical report.

Report.name: Tree with Headers and Footers
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to an create hierarchical with headers and footers.

Report.name: Tree with Totals
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create an hierarchical report with totals.

Report.name: Tree with Totals, All Levels
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create an hierarchical report with totals which includes all sub-levels of tree.

Report.name: Tree with Locked Components
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create an hierarchical report with locked components.

Category.name: Parameters
Category.desc: Reports, presented in this category, demonstrate how to use parameters in reports.

Report.name: Detailed Categories
Report.desc: Detailing by selected category of products.

Report.name: Highlight Condition
Report.desc: Highlighting data rows by selected conditions.

Report.name: Selecting Country
Report.desc: Showing data only by selected countries.

Report.name: Invoice
Report.desc: This sample requests parameters for printing an invoice.

Category.name: Interactive Reports
Category.desc: Reports which show how to work with the Interaction property.

Report.name: Interactive Sorting
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use interactive sorting.

Report.name: Interactive Sorting with Table
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create an interactive sorting using the Table.

Report.name: Group with Collapsing
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use a GroupHeaderBand with collapsing.

Report.name: Group with Collapsing without Footers
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use a GroupHeaderBand without a GroupFooterBand.

Report.name: Master-Detail with Collapsing
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use a Master-Detail report with collapsing.

Report.name: Editable Report
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to edit a rendered report in the Preview Window.

Report.name: Bookmarks, Hyperlinks
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use bookmarks and hyperlinks.

Report.name: Simple Table
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple report using a Table component.

Report.name: Invoice with Groups
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with categories using a Table component.

Report.name: Simple Group
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple report with grouping using a Table component.

Report.name: Fixed Width of Columns
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates the behavior of a Table component when the FixedWidth property of columns is set to true.

Report.name: Population
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Clustered Bar Series.

Report.name: GDP Growth 2005-2010
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Clustered Column Series.

Report.name: Global Growth 2006 and 2008
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Stacked Column Series.

Report.name: Migration by Decade in USA
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Line Series.

Report.name: Foreign official reserves in Euro
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Stepped Area Series.

Report.name: Foreign official reserves in France Italy Germany
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Gantt Series.

Report.name: Oil Extraction by Countries
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Stacked Spline Area Series.

Report.name: Produced Cars
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Line Series.

Report.name: Chart Styles
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use Chart Styles.

Report.name: Simple List with Empty Lines
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple list report with empty lines on the bottom of a page.

Report.name: Master-Detail with Empty Lines
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report with empty lines on the bottom of a page.

Report.name: Invoice with Empty Band
Report.desc: An invoice created using an Empty Band.

Report.name: Side-by-Side Lists
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report that contains two side by side lists with containers.

Report.name: Side-by-Side Groups
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report that contains two side by side groups with containers.

Report.name: Multi-Column List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns using containers.

Report.name: Multi-Containers
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple containers on a page.

Report.name: Master-Detail Cards
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report which data are grouped as cards.

Report.name: Side-by-Side Lists
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report that contains two side by side lists with Sub-Reports.

Report.name: Side-by-Side Lists on DataBand
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report that contains two side by side lists with Sub-Reports on a DataBand.

Report.name: Side-by-Side Groups
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report that contains two side by side groups with Sub-Reports.

Report.name: Two Segments on Width
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with the width of some pages. Use the SegmentPerWidth and SegmentPerHeight properties to set the number of segments of a page.

Report.name: Unlimited Width
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with the unlimited width. Use the UnlimitedWidth property to set the unlimited width of a page.

Report.name: Unlimited Height
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with the unlimited height. Use the UnlimitedHeight property to set the unlimited height of a page.

Report.name: Group and List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to combine printing of a list and group.
